long_description: With synthetic-leather uppers and stiff, low-profile soles, the Shimano WR42 Bike Shoes for women transfer power to the pedals and comfort to you during club and recreational riding. Tough uppers made of synthetic leather and mesh resist stretching for a close, women-specific fit. Shimano WR42 Bike Shoes are snug yet breathable for a comfortable ride. Micro-adjustable ratcheting buckle and dual offset straps deliver a precise fit. Women-specific sole secures your feet into the ideal ergnonomic position for a more efficient stroke. Fiberglass-reinforced polyamide sole is lightweight and low profile for speed and durability.
short_description: With synthetic-leather uppers and stiff, low-profile soles, the Shimano WR42 Bike Shoes for women transfer power to the pedals and comfort to you during club and recreational riding.
